valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Fri 6 Feb 2026 to 06:00 (UTC) on Sat 7 Feb 2026
general_synopsis: Low west Sole 971 expected southwest Fastnet 979 by midnight tonight

Viking.text:
Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 4 to 6, occasionally 3 at first and 7 later, perhaps gale 8 later in far south . In northeast, southeasterly 3 to 5.
Sea state
In southwest, mainly rough, occasionally very rough later. in northeast, slight or moderate.
Weather
In southwest, occasional sleet. In northeast, occasional sleet.
Visibility
In southwest, good, occasionally poor. In northeast, good, occasionally poor.
